message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you, so I think this is a fair price. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is still a bit low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $13,500?  This would be a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product.
